header.description: No header tokens required — report has no scalar summary fields

rows.description: Notification detail rows showing ID, type, message, user, read status, and timestamp

totals.description: No totals row required — simple detail report

semantics: All tokens are direct column passthroughs from app_notifications. No filtering or parameterization required. The time column can optionally be used for date-range filtering at runtime.
transformations: Direct 1:1 mapping from app_notifications columns to row tokens — no reshape, no computed columns
